stories.text:
Hey HN!

We just went live on Product Hunt with my side-project turned full-time project Habitual Money!

It’s a personal finance app that makes it easy to track and categorize your spend across your Amazon, Venmo and daily transactions.

We enable you to personalize and automate how you manage your money with a custom smart-rule engine.

We like to think of Habitual as the Superhuman for your finances.

Would love your feedback on the app!

Website: https://www.habitual.money/ PH: https://www.producthunt.com/posts/habitual-money-budgeting-made-easy
